mapper.select: SELECT sp.id AS id, sp.product_id AS productId, sp.seckill_price AS seckillPrice, sp.stock_count AS stockCount, sp.start_date_time AS startDateTime, sp.end_date_time AS endDateTime, sp.time AS time, UNIX_TIMESTAMP(sp.start_date_time) AS startDateTimeUnix, UNIX_TIMESTAMP(sp.end_date_time) AS endDateTimeUnix, p.id AS productId, p.product_name AS productName, p.product_title AS productTitle, p.product_img AS productImg, p.product_detail AS productDetail, p.product_price AS productPrice FROM seckill_product sp LEFT JOIN product p ON sp.product_id = p.id where date_format(start_date_time, '%Y-%m-%d') = date_format(now(), '%Y-%m-%d') and time = #{time};

SELECT sp.id AS id, sp.product_id AS productId, sp.seckill_price AS seckillPrice, sp.limit_buy AS limitBuy, sp.stock_count AS stockCount, sp.start_date_time AS startDateTime, sp.end_date_time AS endDateTime, UNIX_TIMESTAMP(sp.start_date_time) AS startDateTimeUnix, UNIX_TIMESTAMP(sp.end_date_time) AS endDateTimeUnix, sp.time AS time, p.id AS productId, p.product_name AS productName, p.product_title AS productTitle, p.product_img AS productImg, p.product_detail AS productDetail, p.product_price AS productPrice FROM seckill_product sp LEFT JOIN product p ON sp.product_id = p.id where sp.id = #{seckillId}
